name: Spontaneous Combustion Vortex Simulator
description:
Games Jams#3 for my 2nd Year University Project @NUA

Spontaneous Combustion Vortex Simulator is a Casual Timer Based game in which you must take control of a Firey Tornado and sweep through the Town 

Credits--------------------------------------------------

Character Designed and Rigged By Joe Hamilton

Audio from https://freesound.org/
